txt.en: Burn the remains of wights at Aufaltor

Many are the Dead that roam Aufaltor, the Fane of the Eye. Their ancient tombs lie broken and more undead crawl forth from the cracked earth with each passing moment. Alas, even in defeat, wights are not truly slain.\n\nYou should burn the remains of slain wights and prevent them from being raised again by the evils dwelling in Thuringwath.
Burn the remains of wights at Aufaltor.
You have burned many of the wights at Aufaltor.
Terrible wights stalk the unearthed, ancient tombs at Aufaltor, the Fane of the Eye.
Burned the remains of wights at Aufaltor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Although the Dead seem to rise without end at Aufaltor, you have ensured that the wights you defeated shall never again return.
Burn the remains of wights at Aufaltor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Wights can be found at Aufaltor.\n\nYou have encountered a number of wights at Aufaltor. You should burn their remains to prevent them from being raised again.
